name: The Timeless Normandy Chateau
description:
DESCRIPTION
Come and experience a unique and beautiful setting at the Château.
Located one hour west of Paris, you will be seduced by the charm and elegance of this large 17th century Norman residence, by the calm and serenity that reign in the vast English-style park and by the view which extends beyond the enclosure walls towards the meadows and forests.
The charm, elegance and authenticity of this place offer an ideally located setting, in the heart of Normandy and one hour from Paris, which allows you to stage your wedding receptions and cocktail parties.
The 6 large reception rooms can comfortably accommodate up to 200 seated guests.
The reception areas of the estate are privatized for each reception.
A place of character:
Enjoy magnificent décor for your receptions; the castle offers different spaces that can host all types of events.
In summer, your cocktails will be served on the large terrace and / or in the adjoining lounges inside the castle and dinners and parties are organized in the lounges (more intimate receptions), in our vaulted rooms which can accommodate 80 people seated in the same room, or in an orangery, with a direct connection. with the large terrace.
The vast English-style park that surrounds the castle allows you to personalize your reception to your own style.
Outdoor cocktails on the terrace
Upon arrival, your guests are greeted on the 700m² terrace.
Buffets can be installed there, on either side of the double staircase, or on the lawns of the English park. Garden furniture is arranged for the comfort of your guests and stone benches invite you to enjoy the view of the castle and the views towards the forest.
The vaulted rooms
A space full of character, are located in a row on the garden level and offer direct access to the Château's large terrace. In this space we have an area of 150 m2.
Space capacity, depending on layout:
• Seated dinner: 80 people
• For cocktails: 200 people
• U-shaped: 35 people
• In class: 40 people
• Round tables: 80 people
Ideal setting for the best celebrations
Dinners in the 400 M² Orangerie in the Park
The large volumes and the transparency of the glass roof make it possible to highlight your decoration, your lighting, your table decorations.
Whether your guests are 100 or 400, our team, with its experience, will accompany you so that this magical place will make your wedding reception unforgettable. Round tables, a head table and elegant chairs are at your disposal.
The partner caterers have been selected for the excellence of their services.
The orangery and the Château, an alliance of modernity and the charm of the old, are the ideal setting for entertaining in a refined and friendly way.
Cocktails and Evenings in the chateau lounges
Inside the castle, the lounges are organized on two levels, offering large spaces for evening cocktails or dinners. On the ground floor, the castle has numerous adjoining lounges with direct access to the large terrace. On the ground floor, the vaulted rooms with unusual charm will allow you to organize cocktails, dinners, evenings as you wish. All of these lounges may host cocktails when the weather does not allow you to enjoy the outdoors.
The Park, the ceremonies
When you discover the Chateau, you are immediately touched by the harmony of the ensemble formed by the castle and the park. The omnipresent nature in this place conveys an impression of calm and serenity.
The charm of this very large space is a source of inspiration to organize beautiful receptions and stage spectacular arrivals, moving secular or religious ceremonies, elegant cocktails and wines of honor, memorable speeches, artistic photos. or taken on the spot and animations of all kinds.
The four guest rooms at Le Pommier Doux, the Domaine's "hunting lodge", will offer you an unforgettable stay.
This large residence, restored with refinement, elegantly decorated with furniture and other objects found over time by the owners, offers on its 25ha estate, very high quality accommodation.
All rooms are decorated in country tones and feature antique furniture. They have a view of the park and the castle and are equipped with a private bathroom. The region offers many attractions thanks to its varied landscapes, its rich architectural heritage, its many gardens to visit and its renowned gastronomy.
Breakfast included: A generous and gourmet breakfast is served by the fireplace or on the terrace, weather permitting.
Hire of the orangerie starts from 2450 euros and to hire the chateau and orangerie together starts from 3950 euros.
